channel.title: NPC dialogue need some help

item.title: NPC dialogue need some help
item.dc:creator: @lollie lollie
item.description:
@lollie wrote:

hi all i wanna make a Npc with dialogue
i used aubury for this coz when i try to chane NPC ID it doesn’t work if someone knows how to change it so it works
but my question for now is how do i make it so when i click yes please it opens a new dialogue with for example "

Varrock

Lumbrudge

More…

and then another dialogue with some more places

this is what i got atm:

case 3: sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884); sendFrame126("Do you want me to take you to 1 of the other train depots?", 4885); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;

case 4: sendFrame171(1, 2465); sendFrame171(0, 2468); sendFrame126("Select an Option", 2460); sendFrame126("Yes please!", 2461); sendFrame126("no thx,maybe later.", 2462); sendFrame164(2459); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;

Read full topic
